summary: This script deletes directories for various regional internet registries (RIRs). It uses Bash and the 'rm -rf' command to forcefully remove empty or non-empty directories, irrespective of any potential error messages. The comment expresses frustration with German language settings, possibly referring to XDM display manager.

details.comment: This script deletes directories for various regional internet registries (RIRs). It uses Bash and the 'rm -rf' command to forcefully remove empty or non-empty directories, irrespective of any potential error messages. The comment expresses frustration with German language settings, possibly referring to XDM display manager.
details.content:
#!/bin/bash
# without shebang it will not be executable.
# i hate german. especially to the fucking xdm.
rm -rf  afrinic
rm -rf  apnic
rm -rf  lacnic
rm -rf  arin
rm -rf  ripe
